what I can for the moment. I'll be at the bar
Måste ha gez för att lämna området??
Hello there Gez, how are you doing?
Yo Konrad?? Aw man, it's good to see you again.
It has been a while huh.
Yeah! But let's catch up later. I Have my
He wants to become a medic you see. I was going
to ask if you maybe could teach the kid a thing
Of course bro, you already know!
Also I want him to visit the Oasis City since
there's lessons to be learned there aswell.
Do you want to guide us there my friend?
I remember it's a bit difficult to find.
Ah.. finding the entrance to the city sure can
be hard. Of course I want to guide you but..
You want me to answer 10 questions or something??
Nah man!! Anything for my homies but y'know..
Haha! I AM too cool for you but I'll still
help you guys, dont worry 'bout it..
You want me to answer 10 questions or something??
Hah! Looks like Konrad taught you well I see.
Before we move on to the desert, let me see how
well you know your stuff. These medical skills
sure can come handy in a city like this, you
I want you too answer me 8 out of 10 questions
correct. And until then, enjoy this beautiful
Just kiddin, its ugly i know.

ya? Talk to me when you are ready to try my 10
I don't want any bussiness with ya stranger!
especially in this city, after all.
